What is Sapling, and how does it improve the VerusCoin blockchain?

Sapling is an upgrade to the VerusCoin blockchain that brings significant improvements to the platform. With Sapling, users can enjoy faster shielded transactions, with some reports of near 1-second and even sub-1-second transaction times. This upgrade also enables the use of revolutionary features like Stake Guard, a Crypto-Condition that helps prevent cheated stake blocks and solves the "Nothing at Stake" problem in Proof of Stake systems.
